sentences.en: The infant may be responding to aspects of the stimulus different than those identified by the investigator.
sentences.cn: 婴儿对刺激产生反应的方面可能与研究者发现的那些不同。

sentences.en: What they found provided their investigator with a solid lead.
sentences.cn: 他们找到的东西给他们的委托调查者提供了确实的线索。

sentences.en: Become an investigator of what you can observer about each point.
sentences.cn: 成为一个侦查员：侦查你在每一点上你所观察到的。
